sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>0</base_damage> <critical_rating/> <defense/> <description>Under-barrel grenade launchers are designed to give soldiers or squads heavy anti-infantry or light anti-vehicle capabilities in a small package. This attachment consists of a basic, smooth-bore barrel attached to a magazine with an automatic feed system. It carries up to six grenades and is fired by a simple press of a button. It adds extra weight to the weapon it's mounted to, however, which makes the entire assembly quite barrel heavy. This attachment can only be applied to rifle-sized weapons (Ranged (Heavy) weapons). Models Include: Czerka "Thumper" Under-barrel Grenade Launcher, SoroSuub XA203 Auxiliary Grenade Launcher, Zone Control "Viper" Under-Barrel Grenade Launcher. Base Modifiers: Enables weapon to fire grenades. This uses the grenade's profile, but uses the Ranged (Heavy) skill to fire and has Medium range. Adds Cumbersome (+1) to weapon, and increase encumbrance by 2. Remember, grenades are Limited Ammo 1 weapons and the launcher is thus Limited Ammo 1. Modification Options: 5 Quality (Limited Ammo + 1) Mods.</description> <encumbrance/> <hard_points/> <hp_required>2</hp_required> <name>Under-Barrel Grenade Launcher</name> <number>GEAR0001153</number> <price>2000</price> <range/> <rarity>5</rarity> <skill_used/> <soak/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-19 04:31:39</sys_created_on> <sys_id>4739737d2fa42c90e0f497eef699b64c</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-19 04:32:27</sys_updated_on> <type>mod</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
